displayName.english: Whatever it is, I'm against it

description.english: Refuse to belong to any club that would have you as a member
Have a Diplomatic Weight of over 9000

Destroy the Galaxy

Vivisect an alien
Start a full fledged first contact war before communications have been fully established

Same as the old boss.

displayName.english: Can you Smell What the Lithoids are Cooking?

displayName.english: Theres a Zombie on my Lawn

make friends...
